attributes.action: Investigate how poor baby P was allowed to be abused with no one stepping in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need a urgent investigation into the death of baby P not just a paper exercise but one that will make a difference all of the proffessionals involved should be held accountable for the death of this poor little boy, The names of the mother and her boyfriend should be released they lost any human rights they had when they murdered that poor little boy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
